metadata.name: Quadrantids Genesis Pass NFT #1
metadata.description: Quadrantids is an Award winning Land Trade Game with a focus on Play to Earn. NFT Cards will be used as Memberships to access the game, with specific scoring for each District, that will be used to level up. Quadrantids City is the Future City in the Metaverse, where fantasy is realty, inspired by Sci-Fi theme. Genesis Passes have unlocked 5 Districts with unique characteristics, each inspired by sci-fi design in a different setting. These Passes will be available only on this Collection of NFTS. In the huge, infinite assembly of Worlds, within the Blockchain,  there is a world where nothing is ordinary. Quadrantids is a world of fantasy, a world of nature and sustainability, a world of dreams and creativity where everything is possible. Quadrantids is dedicated to the creme-de-la-creme collectors, to those who dare, to those who choose to be legendary...Not for everyone... Are you Ready?
